customer_quote: It's just not sustainable long term with the size of our organization to keep up with it.
context: Sara is primarily responsible for cleaning the courts, which is not sustainable.
source: Sara Dawson Autopilot Meeting Recording.pdf

customer_quote: The mopping doesn't work that well... you can still see the stains even after we mop.
context: Current cleaning methods are not effective in removing stains.
source: Sara Dawson Autopilot Meeting Recording.pdf

customer_quote: The cost did go up for the vacuum service monthly.
context: Engaged a janitorial service that increased costs.
source: Sara Dawson Autopilot Meeting Recording.pdf

customer_quote: The backpack vacuum, it kills my shoulder.
context: Sara experiences physical strain from using current cleaning equipment.
source: Sara Dawson Autopilot Meeting Recording.pdf

customer_quote: we pay people to currently, like, you know, sweep our courts, and we have issues sometimes with our sweepers and they break down
context: Current manual sweeping process is labor-intensive and equipment is unreliable
source: George Zink Operation Autopilot Meeting Recording.pdf

customer_quote: The biggest thing that we found with vacuums is that tennis ball fuzz does not handle well.
context: Current vacuums struggle with tennis ball fuzz, affecting cleaning quality
source: George Zink Operation Autopilot Meeting Recording.pdf

customer_quote: labor costs all in probably ballpark it at like 2,000 bucks a month
context: Current cleaning costs are significant due to full-time maintenance staff
source: George Zink Operation Autopilot Meeting Recording.pdf

customer_quote: I want to understand how an automated cleaning system like this deals with individually fenced courts.
context: Concern about how the cleaning robots will navigate individually fenced courts.
source: Pickleball Club of Georgia Operation Autopilot Introduction.pdf

customer_quote: This was just mopped yesterday. Can you see that or no?
context: The customer is concerned about visible stains and splotches on the floor despite recent cleaning.
source: Rally House Facility Meeting Recording.pdf

customer_quote: I can't tell you how many hours I clean a day just to keep.
context: The customer is spending excessive time cleaning the facility manually.
source: Rally House Facility Meeting Recording.pdf

customer_quote: We're profitable but not highly profitable. And so we're counting our pennies.
context: The customer is concerned about the cost of cleaning services and potential new investments.
source: Rally House Facility Meeting Recording.pdf

customer_quote: We've got courts that we don't feel like we do a good job cleaning.
context: The customer is concerned about the effectiveness of their current cleaning methods.
source: Pickleville x Operation Autopilot Meeting Recording.pdf

customer_quote: It's quite a difference in expense to have the machine versus us doing it in house.
context: The customer is comparing the cost of manual cleaning versus using the cleaning robot.
source: Pickleville x Operation Autopilot Meeting Recording.pdf

customer_quote: It's a pretty bad situation when, you know, clubs are just opening up and they're already resurfacing.
context: The customer is concerned about the wear and tear on courts from current cleaning methods.
source: Pickleville x Operation Autopilot Meeting Recording.pdf

customer_quote: The courts get pretty dusty. I'm not sure why or how. They just do.
context: Dust accumulation on courts affects member experience and performance.
source: Del Norte Athletic Club Operation Autopilot Introduction (1).pdf

customer_quote: It's taking quite a while. I think like an hour and a half or something like that.
context: Current manual cleaning process is time-consuming.
source: Del Norte Athletic Club Operation Autopilot Introduction (1).pdf

customer_quote: We don't have really much additional expenditure to put out for this beyond what we're, you know, already doing and paying our, you know, custodial workers and our facilities folks.
context: Limited budget for additional expenses.
source: Del Norte Athletic Club Operation Autopilot Introduction (1).pdf

customer_quote: The manpower, exactly what you say in your brochure.
context: Current cleaning requires significant manpower.
source: Mike Turpin Abhinav Anand Meeting Recording.pdf

customer_quote: That's also like your staff time, right?
context: Concern about the hidden costs of staff time for cleaning.
source: Mike Turpin Abhinav Anand Meeting Recording.pdf

customer_quote: But yeah, I mean, if I could have a robot doing it versus me doing it.
context: Ryan cleans the courts sporadically and sees value in automating the process.
source: Picklr Tempe Operation Autopilot Introduction.pdf

customer_quote: If we can extend the life of the surface, you know, that helps with the model of, you know, our pro formas.
context: Concern about the longevity of court surfaces and the potential cost of resurfacing.
source: Picklr Tempe Operation Autopilot Introduction.pdf

customer_quote: it takes a lot of time
context: Currently manually cleaning courts themselves
source: Mary Jo Greaves Operation Autopilot Meeting Recording.pdf

customer_quote: if we could take time away from that and give time back to the worker to do something else a little bit more.
context: Workers are currently cleaning the courts during their shifts
source: Mary Jo Greaves Operation Autopilot Meeting Recording.pdf

customer_quote: The amounts that I'm hearing are high. Make that money back. I don't know if the investment worth it.
context: Concerns about the cost of the cleaning robot compared to current expenses
source: Mary Jo Greaves Operation Autopilot Meeting Recording.pdf

customer_quote: For the sake of that my courts need to be clean on a more consistent basis.
context: Kevin wants to increase the frequency of court cleaning from twice a month to once a week.
source: Kevin OBrien Operation Autopilot Meeting Recording.pdf

customer_quote: We're looking at a service, cleaning service that will charge, you know, 250 a week. That's 500 bucks. That's a thousand.
context: Current cleaning service costs are high for the desired cleaning frequency.
source: Kevin OBrien Operation Autopilot Meeting Recording.pdf

customer_quote: a budget of 1,000 or $30,000 for a unit is not something that we're, we have an appetite for at this point.
context: Discussing the high cost of cleaning equipment and budget constraints.
source: PickleSpot Indoor Courts Operation Autopilot Introduction.pdf

customer_quote: it's not designed for sensitive surfaces. So what's going to happen is in six months your courts are going to be ripped to shreds.
context: Concerns about using inappropriate cleaning equipment that could damage the court surfaces.
source: PickleSpot Indoor Courts Operation Autopilot Introduction.pdf

customer_quote: my biggest concern is, you know, making sure we're spending a lot of money on our courts with we're using acrotech cushion X cords. Just making sure they maintain as long as possible.
context: Concern about maintaining the quality and longevity of the courts
source: Alex Karsos Operation Autopilot Meeting Recording.pdf

customer_quote: minimize my cost for cleaning this facility as well.
context: Looking to reduce cleaning costs
source: Alex Karsos Operation Autopilot Meeting Recording.pdf

customer_quote: she's spending like almost eight hours a day just cleaning every single bit of that facility.
context: Current cleaning process is time-consuming
source: Alex Karsos Operation Autopilot Meeting Recording.pdf

customer_quote: The same court surface was installed at our flagship location and a year and a half into it they had to redo the surface.
context: Concerns about the longevity of the court surface and maintenance challenges.
source: Operation Autopilot Ace Pickleball Club Introduction (2).pdf

customer_quote: It's all in house. It's all like employees.
context: Current cleaning is managed by staff with manual processes.
source: Operation Autopilot Ace Pickleball Club Introduction (2).pdf

customer_quote: I'm seeing a lot of these issues that the normal cleaning is not addressing.
context: Existing cleaning methods are not effectively maintaining court cleanliness.
source: Operation Autopilot Ace Pickleball Club Introduction (2).pdf

customer_quote: I'm not at a point right now where I can afford to pay that kind of money.
context: Discussing the cost of the cleaning robot and the financial situation of the facility.
source: Zero Zero Two Pickleball Operation Autopilot Introduction.pdf

customer_quote: I have to be my own floor scrubber.
context: Describing the manual effort required to maintain the courts.
source: Zero Zero Two Pickleball Operation Autopilot Introduction.pdf

customer_quote: I'm worried about the degradation of the court with the, you know, I gotta find the right brushes.
context: Concerns about the impact of cleaning equipment on court surfaces.
source: Zero Zero Two Pickleball Operation Autopilot Introduction.pdf

customer_quote: Not the results we'd like to see.
context: Current cleaning results are unsatisfactory with existing equipment.
source: Daniel Hardeman Operation Autopilot Meeting Recording.pdf

customer_quote: We don't want to over clean, of course, because we don't want to wear off the surface.
context: Concern about cleaning frequency affecting court surface longevity.
source: Daniel Hardeman Operation Autopilot Meeting Recording.pdf

customer_quote: I've got to have a person and I've got to use... a couple of them are 68 year old women. Well, they're not going to operate a manual floor scrubbing piece of equipment.
context: Discussing the challenges of using manual floor scrubbers with current staff.
source: Gregory Straub Operation Autopilot Meeting.pdf

customer_quote: You're going to run it into the post and the fence and the net post.
context: Concerns about potential damage from manual scrubbers operated by staff.
source: Gregory Straub Operation Autopilot Meeting.pdf

customer_quote: Right now we are renting about once a month. But I'd like to be doing it more.
context: Desire to clean courts more frequently than current rental schedule allows.
source: Gregory Straub Operation Autopilot Meeting.pdf

customer_quote: we felt like it was too rough and it could damage the surface
context: Concern about previous vacuum use being too rough on court surfaces
source: Martina Kostalova Operation Autopilot Meeting (2).pdf

customer_quote: It's a high school kid that I hired to come twice a week.
context: Currently relies on a high school student for cleaning, which is not a professional solution.
source: Jewel Basin Center Operation Autopilot Introduction (1).pdf

customer_quote: It's not really a problem until the winter comes, when. Then we have to increase the frequency.
context: Cleaning becomes more challenging in winter due to increased dirt from members.
source: Jewel Basin Center Operation Autopilot Introduction (1).pdf
